forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As morning unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, the city is enveloped in a shroud of patchy drizzle and an embrace of clouds, offering a muted yet contemplative ambiance. The cool air, resting just above the mild temperatures, holds a whisper of the ocean, hinting at the marine layer's presence—most distinctly lingering around the Golden Gate, veiling it in its characteristic mystery. While the skies appear weary, with an expectant grayness, small pockets of brightness promise a gentler unfolding as the day progresses.

By lunchtime, the dripping crescendos of early drizzle will retreat, making way for flares of sunlight that will dance across the city’s rooftops, although temperatures are unlikely to stir up much warmth. A light breeze will tug at your sleeves, encouraging layered outfits—perhaps a light jacket paired with a cozy shirt underneath, perfect for meandering through local shops or indulging in the pleasure of a café terrace. Whether you navigate the streets or catch a bridge view, the day's simplicity suggests a leisurely pace, inviting quiet reflections and satisfying conversations amidst the serene backdrop of the ever-enigmatic fog.
